G

GameEngine - Class in edu.cpp.cs.cs141.assignment2
This class represents a GameEngine, which passes or returns data to other classes or method to represent game state.
GameEngine() - Constructor for class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.assignment2.GameEngine
This is the constructor for the class.
getAmmo() - Method in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.assignment2.Gun
This method returns a String represention of ammo as a ratio with a combination of the number of rounds left (ammo), a slash, and the maximum number of rounds the Gun can hold (maxAmmo).
getBattleAction() - Method in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.assignment2.UserInterface
This method gathers user input to decide whether to try to shoot the Enemy or attempt to escape.
getDungeon() - Method in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.assignment2.GameEngine
This method simply returns the String array that represents the dungeon
getEnemy() - Method in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.assignment2.GameEngine
This method simply returns the instance of Enemy.
getEnemyAmmo() - Method in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.assignment2.GameEngine
This method returns the String ratio of ammo to maxAmmo of Enemy's Gun.
getEnemyHP() - Method in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.assignment2.GameEngine
This method simply returns the amount of hitPoints Enemy currently has.
getEnemyWeapon() - Method in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.assignment2.GameEngine
This method returns a String representation of the Gun type that Enemy currently holds.
getGun() - Method in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.assignment2.ActiveAgent
This method simply returns the Gun of the calling ActiveAgent
getHP() - Method in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.assignment2.ActiveAgent
This method returns the hitPoints of the calling ActiveAgent.
getItem() - Method in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.assignment2.Enemy
This method returns a String representation of the type of item that the Enemy holds.
getPlayer() - Method in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.assignment2.GameEngine
This method simply returns the instance of Player.
getPlayerAmmo() - Method in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.assignment2.GameEngine
This method simply returns the ratio of Player's Gun ammo to maxAmmo.
getPlayerHP() - Method in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.assignment2.GameEngine
This method simply returns the amount of hitPoints that Player has.
getPlayerWeapon() - Method in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.assignment2.GameEngine
This method simply returns the type of Gun that Player currently holds.
getType() - Method in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.assignment2.Item
This method simply returns the type of Item held by Enemy.
getWeaponChoice() - Method in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.assignment2.UserInterface
This method prompts the user for a Gun to use for the whole game.
getWeaponType() - Method in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.assignment2.Gun
This method retrieves the type of weapon assigned to weaponType and returns it.
giveWeapon() - Method in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.assignment2.Enemy
This method assigns a Gun to Enemy based on the value of spawnWeapon indexed at Enemy.weaponSpot.
Gun - Class in edu.cpp.cs.cs141.assignment2
This class represents the Gun, which is the weapon held by an ActiveAgent.
Gun(String) - Constructor for class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.assignment2.Gun
This is the constructor for the class.
